properties.body:
STRAIT OF SICILY.
PELAGIE ISLANDS TO TUNISIA.
VESSEL, 30 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
BETWEEN LAMPEDUSA (35-30N 012-36E) AND TUNISIA.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527,
39 065 908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
3906 5908 4409, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
